title: About
description: Detail-oriented and motivated data analyst with a strong foundation in data analysis, statistical techniques, and data visualization. Holding a Bachelor’s degree in chemical engineering, I possess robust analytical and problem-solving skills and a track record of leveraging data to drive strategic decision-making and deliver actionable business insight.
heading: Data Analyst & Business Analyst
intro: Results-driven data analyst with expertise in data analysis, statistical methods, and visualization. A chemical engineering graduate with exceptional analytical skills, dedicated to turning complex data into actionable business insights for strategic success.
additionalInfo: Analytical data professional with a chemical engineering background, specializing in data analysis, statistical techniques, and visualization to deliver impactful insights and drive business success.

Resume.title: Resume
Resume.description: Expert in interpreting data to deliver strategic insights and drive decision-making.

professionalExperience.title: Head of Data Science
responsibilities: Directed and managed activities of the company’s data science team, achieving 100% productivity
Partnered with cross-functional teams to grasp business requirements and deliver actionable insights boosting work efficiency by 70%
Boosted team effectiveness by 50% since taking on the role.

professionalExperience.title: Business Analyst
responsibilities: Analyzed company sales data and developed a stakeholder dashboard, enhancing decision-making and strategy by 40%
Improved data processing efficiency by 20% through meticulous data cleaning.
Created visualizations and dashboards with relevant KPIs, achieving 95% accuracy to track company progress and product performance

professionalExperience.title: Laboratory Analyst
responsibilities: Analyzed and certified petroleum product quality using established specifications, ensuring high standards.
Documented quality control test results, increasing workflow efficiency by 50%
Earned recognition as the best intern on the team for exceptional performance and dedication

Servicessection.title: Services
Servicessection.description: Specialized in leveraging data visualization and analytical tools to present clear, actionable insights that solve complex business challenges.

services.title: Data Analytics
services.description: Transform raw data into actionable insights to drive smarter decisions and business growth.

services.title: Business Analytics
services.description: Analyze business performance and identify opportunities to optimize processes and maximize profitability.

services.title: Data Visualization
services.description: Create compelling visual representations of data to uncover patterns and trends effectively.

services.title: Dashboard Development
services.description: Design interactive dashboards that provide real-time monitoring and performance metrics.

services.title: Business Process Optimization
services.description: Streamline workflows and enhance operational efficiency through tailored process improvements.

services.title: Project Management
services.description: Plan, organize, and oversee projects to ensure timely delivery and successful outcomes.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.description: Recognized by clients and colleagues for delivering data-driven insights that consistently exceed expectations and drive impactful results

testimonials.quote: Sam transforms complex data into actionable insights using statistical analysis and visualization, turning challenges into strategies for business growth.
testimonials.name: Saul Goodman

testimonials.quote: Leveraging chemical engineering and analytical expertise, Sam delivers clear insights through data analysis and visualization, empowering businesses to make strategic decisions.
testimonials.name: Sara Wilsson

testimonials.quote: Sam excels in decoding data complexities, employing statistical methods and visualization to craft impactful strategies that drive success and create opportunities.
